meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of tasting like grapes.
meanings.sent1: The grapiness of the wine was delightful.
meanings.sent2: I love the grapiness of grape juice.
meanings.sent3: The grapiness of the grape soda made me feel like I was drinking a bunch of grapes!
meanings.sent4: Her perfume had a grapiness that transported me to a vineyard.
meanings.sent5: The grapiness of the jelly was so intense, it felt like eating fresh grapes.

meanings.definition: The state of having a strong grape flavor or aroma.
meanings.sent1: The grapiness of the air in the vineyard was intoxicating.
meanings.sent2: The grapiness of the grape candy was irresistible.
meanings.sent3: The grapiness of the grape popsicle made me feel like I was biting into a grape itself!
meanings.sent4: The grapiness of her voice was so sweet, it was like listening to a grape sing.
meanings.sent5: The grapiness of the room was so strong, it felt like being inside a grape.
